Bibliotheca scholastica instructissima. Or, A treasury of ancient adagies, and sententious prouerbes selected out of the English, Greeke, Latine, French, Italian and Spanish. Ranked in alphabeticall order, and suited to one and the same sense. Published by Thomas Draxe Batch. in Diuinitie. Draxe, Thomas, d. 1618.

Apud Ioannem Billium, Londini : 1616.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
